US Outbreak Simulator

This is a simulator of a viral outbreak in the United States in the span of 1 year based on American Airlines (AA) flight data of 2015. To start, select a state in which 100 infected individuals would be placed. Set the r-number (number of people that 1 individual will infect) and recovery rate. You may also set up lockdown protocols for states to show a more realistic outcome. Then, you can start the simulation. Consecutive simulations are possible.

* Click to Remove States
